forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind around 10 mph.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 9 to 23 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn unfolds over Downtown San Francisco, a gentle mist envelops the streets, weaving its cool fingers through the cityscape. The air carries a crispness, hinting at the marine influence that blankets the hills and mingles with the soft rustling of leaves. This morning leans towards a mostly cloudy embrace, with temperatures hovering gracefully around 56 degrees. The west-southwest wind whispers through the alleys, setting a subtly breezy tone reminiscent of distant waves.

As we transition into the day, the clouds will part, unveiling a mostly sunny disposition that promises warmth and brightness. The high will gently rise to about 66 degrees, tapering to a comfortable 64 as the afternoon approaches. Gusts of wind may surprise you with their energy, reaching up to 29 mph, reminding one of the city's vibrant character. Ideal for a leisurely stroll or perhaps a visit to a local café, it's the perfect moment to relish a warm beverage while observing the world awaken. A light jacket or layers will serve you well, adapting to the coolness of the morning and the warmth of midday. Embrace this day as an invitation to linger at a park, or perhaps explore the nooks and crannies of a hidden neighborhood, relishing the pleasures of a San Francisco summer.
